title: Paranoid
resume: The murder of a female GP in a rural playground in front of numerous witnesses draws a group of detectives into an ever-darkening mystery that takes them across Europe, aided by mysterious notes sent by the "Ghost Detective".

The programs that have this rating may include moderate or strong adult themes, language, sexual inference, and violence.
